items.name: Classic Pancakes
items.description: Fluffy pancakes served with butter, maple syrup, and a side of fresh berries.

items.name: Eggs Benedict
items.description: Toasted English muffins topped with poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and creamy hollandaise sauce.

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description: Crispy sourdough bread topped with smashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of feta cheese.

items.name: Breakfast Burrito
items.description: A hearty burrito filled with scrambled eggs, bacon, cheese, and hash browns, served with salsa.

items.name: French Toast
items.description: Thick slices of brioche dipped in egg batter, cooked to golden brown and topped with powdered sugar and syrup.

items.name: Omelette Deluxe
items.description: A fluffy three-egg omelette loaded with ham, cheese, mushrooms, peppers, and onions.

items.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
items.description: Creamy Greek yogurt layered with granola, honey, and fresh fruit.

items.name: Smoked Salmon Bagel
items.description: A toasted bagel topped with cream cheese, smoked salmon, capers, and red onion.

items.name: Chicken Burger
items.description: A juicy grilled chicken patty topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and creamy mayo on a toasted bun.

items.name: Roast Beef Sandwich
items.description: Tender slices of roast beef piled high on fresh bread with a touch of horseradish and creamy mayo.

items.name: Alfredo Pizza
items.description: A creamy Alfredo sauce topped with mozzarella, grilled chicken, and a sprinkle of parmesan.

items.name: Sirloin Steak
items.description: A juicy and tender sirloin steak grilled to perfection, served with your choice of sides.

items.name: Protein Bowl
items.description: A healthy mix of grilled chicken, quinoa, avocado, and a variety of fresh veggies, topped with a light dressing.

items.name: Fish and Chips
items.description: Crispy battered fish fillets served with golden fries and a side of tartar sauce.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: A classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomato, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

items.name: Tri Tip
items.description: Perfectly seasoned and grilled tri tip steak, served with your choice of sides and sauce.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: A perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with a lemon butter sauce and a side of seasonal vegetables.

items.name: Lamb Chops
items.description: Tender and juicy lamb chops marinated in garlic and herbs, served with creamy mashed potatoes.

items.name: Pasta Primavera
items.description: A colorful medley of fresh vegetables tossed with penne pasta in a light garlic olive oil sauce.

items.name: Filet Mignon
items.description: An 8-ounce filet mignon grilled to perfection, served with a red wine reduction and roasted asparagus.

items.name: Seafood Risotto
items.description: Creamy risotto cooked with shrimp, scallops, and mussels, seasoned with white wine and parmesan cheese.

items.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
items.description: Bell peppers stuffed with seasoned ground beef, rice, and cheese, baked to perfection and topped with marinara sauce.

items.name: BBQ Ribs
items.description: Slow-cooked BBQ pork ribs served with coleslaw and a side of cornbread.

items.name: Eggplant Parmesan
items.description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese, baked to golden perfection.
